title: Will my phone automatically upgrade to 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: NO! it will not. It’s a HARDWARE thing. NOT a software! there’s a piece in your phone called Modem. if it does not support 5G now. it won’t ever. until you’ll buy a phone that supports 5G
Your question: “Will my phone automatically upgrade to 5G?” No. It requires the hardware (not software) to be changed. Means a new phone will be needed.

If it is a new phone that is capable of 5G, once there is 5G coverage in your area the phone will be able to use 5G. If the phone is not 5G capable, there is no upgrade for it to make it 5G capable. To use 5G, you need a phone built to handle 5G.
Not a chance 3G, 4G, 5G are not like Apps you download in Store that can be updated right away To upgrade to 5G, you should change to one that support 5G
